official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain property to the Hadley Memorial Hospital, Washington, DC.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands to the Hadley Memorial Hospital, Washington, D. C.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain property to the Hadley Memorial Hospital, Washington, DC.
